title: Help!
body: kann kein lo mehr spielen (spiel ist im prozess angeblich aber startet einfach nicht mehr was soll ich machen..)    cant play lol cause when i start a game is still in progress but  cant recconect and  its never started  ... what can i do??

replies.body:
From the sounds it, you may have been stuck in what is called a Ghost Game.  Essentially, the client thinks you are in a game that never actually started, and therefore won't allow you to do anything else.  This usually only lasts a max of 2 hours before releasing you and letting you join another game.

Since it has been many hours since then, let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
someone who knows what can i do ?

Just tell him if you're still having the same issue o if it is resolved.
